channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Government shutdown sparks GOP plan to penalize lawmakers with new salary tax
item.description: Lawmakers, unlike federal workers, are constitutionally required to receive a paycheck during a government shutdown.

item.title: Sam Altman on AI bubble: ‘People make some dumb capital allocations’ from time to time

item.title: The government is shut down but Trump’s social media feed is working overtime
item.description: The stream of invective and trolling has been remarkable even for a 79-year-old president who is as chronically online as any member of Gen Z.
